import Table from "react-bootstrap/Table"; import { FormattedMessage } from "react-intl"; function Tabla(props) { return (
{ props.selectedRoom.devices.map((e,i)=>( ))}
# ID
{i} {e.id} {e.name} {e.desired.value}
); } export default Tabla;
